function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct pilot studies to assess scalability, develop flexible implementation frameworks, integrate community feedback into scalability planning, and establish clear criteria for successful scale-up","category":"Research and development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in collecting detailed local and national level entomological, incidence, and prevalence data","category":"Research and development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuing and expanding efforts to meet who targets for vbd control","category":"Improved surveillance and reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting more community-based studies to understand local perspectives on vbd control and climate change control","category":"Integrated and coordinated action","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop adaptation strategies tailored to local resource-limited settings, provide education on climate change engagement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Move beyond disease silos, reframe surveillance to address co-infection","category":"Integrated and coordinated
